32 #include <vector>
33 #include <cstdlib>

35 namespace Mutation {
36  namespace Kinetics {
37 
38 
49 template <int N>
50 class Stoich
51 {
52 public:
53 
57  Stoich()
58  {
59  m_rxn = 0;
60  for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i)
61  m_sps[i] = 0;
62  }
63 
64  /*template <typename OP>
65  inline void updateReaction(
66  const double* const p_s, double* const p_r, const OP& op) const
67  {
68  for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i)
69  op(p_r[m_rnx], p_s[m_sps[i]]);
70  }*/
71 
81  inline void multReaction(const double* const p_s, double* const p_r) const
82  {
83  for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i)
84  p_r[m_rxn] *= p_s[m_sps[i]];
85  }
86 
96  inline void incrReaction(const double* const p_s, double* const p_r) const
97  {
98  for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i)
99  p_r[m_rxn] += p_s[m_sps[i]];
100  }
101 
111  inline void decrReaction(const double* const p_s, double* const p_r) const
112  {
113  for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i)
114  p_r[m_rxn] -= p_s[m_sps[i]];
115  }
116 
126  inline void incrSpecies(const double* const p_r, double* const p_s) const
127  {
128  for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i)
129  p_s[m_sps[i]] += p_r[m_rxn];
130  }
131 
141  inline void decrSpecies(const double* const p_r, double* const p_s) const
142  {
143  for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i)
144  p_s[m_sps[i]] -= p_r[m_rxn];
145  }
146 
147 protected:
148 
149  size_t m_rxn;
150  size_t m_sps[N];
151 
152 }; // class Stoich<N>
153 
154 
158 class Stoich1 : public Stoich<1>
159 {
160 public:
161  Stoich1(size_t rxn, size_t sp1)
162  {
163  m_rxn = rxn;
164  m_sps[0] = sp1;
165  }
166 };
167 
171 class Stoich2 : public Stoich<2>
172 {
173 public:
174  Stoich2(size_t rxn, size_t sp1, size_t sp2)
175  {
176  m_rxn = rxn;
177  if (sp1 <= sp2) {
178  m_sps[0] = sp1;
179  m_sps[1] = sp2;
180  } else {
181  m_sps[0] = sp2;
182  m_sps[1] = sp1;
183  }
184  }
185 };
186 
187 
191 class Stoich3 : public Stoich<3>
192 {
193 public:
194  Stoich3(size_t rxn, size_t sp1, size_t sp2, size_t sp3)
195  {
196  m_rxn = rxn;
197 
198  if (sp1 <= sp2) {
199  m_sps[0] = sp1;
200  m_sps[1] = sp2;
201  } else {
202  m_sps[0] = sp2;
203  m_sps[1] = sp1;
204  }
205 
206  if (m_sps[1] <= sp3)
207  m_sps[2] = sp3;
208  else {
209  if (sp3 <= m_sps[0]) {
210  m_sps[2] = m_sps[1];
211  m_sps[1] = m_sps[0];
212  m_sps[0] = sp3;
213  } else {
214  m_sps[2] = m_sps[1];
215  m_sps[1] = sp3;
216  }
217  }
218  }
219 };
220 
221 
226 class StoichiometryManager
227 {
228 public:
229 
230  StoichiometryManager() { }
231 
232  void addReaction(const int rxn, const std::vector<int>& sps);
233 
234  void multReactions(const double* const p_s, double* const p_r) const;
235 
236  void incrReactions(const double* const p_s, double* const p_r) const;
237 
238  void decrReactions(const double* const p_s, double* const p_r) const;
239 
240  void incrSpecies(const double* const p_r, double* const p_s) const;
241 
242  void decrSpecies(const double* const p_r, double* const p_s) const;
243 
244 private:
245 
246  std::vector<Stoich1> m_stoich1_vec;
247  std::vector<Stoich2> m_stoich2_vec;
248  std::vector<Stoich3> m_stoich3_vec;
249 
250 }; // class StoichiometryManager
